fixes.name: dep calc 1
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the row-level Tableau calculated field [dep calc 1] which is defined as [DeptID] to a Power BI calculated column by directly referencing the DeptID column in the same table using 'HR Dataset'[DeptID].

fixes.name: dep calc 2
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the row-level Tableau expression [dep calc 1] * [MarriedID] to a Power BI calculated column. Both references are transformed to the table-qualified form ('HR Dataset'[dep calc 1] and 'HR Dataset'[MarriedID]) and the multiplication is preserved as a row-level calculation.
